messages.subject: Re: trouble with the concept

messages.messageBody:
<<what did you do today?>>

I got up at 6:30 and took a shower. I got the kids(5 of them, ages 12 to 3)
up (we had to be out of the house early today) and they had breakfast. The
oldest 2 and I fed all the animals while the little kids cuddled under
blankets and watched a movie. We fed 2 dogs and 8 goats, milked the goats.
Adriane figured out how much milk her goat gave and recorded it. Zach
helped figure how much his goat ate and recorded it and I did this for mine.

We got everyone dressed and headed into town for play practice. The kids
not involved in the play spent time with their friends in another room,
chit-chatting about movies and such.

We came home and had lunch. Adriane turned the soap she is making for the
county homemaking fair. Zach is listening to cds on the playstation and his
little brother is singing along. This afternoon the little kids will go
play with friends and the bigger kids and I will go to a 4-H meeting. Then
some of the other kids are off to friends' houses for the evening to play.
The rest of us will probably straighten up the house and play games.

Julie
